alert.note: Alert for Comanche; Cotton (Oklahoma) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.headline: Severe Thunderstorm Warning issued July 13 at 6:18PM CDT until July 13 at 7:00PM CDT by NWS Norman-Oklahoma City
info.description: ...A SEVERE THUNDERSTORM WARNING REMAINS IN EFFECT UNTIL 700 PM CDT FOR SOUTHWESTERN COMANCHE AND NORTHWESTERN COTTON COUNTIES... At 618 PM CDT, the leading edge of winds from a severe thunderstorm was located near Faxon, moving northeast at 30 mph. HAZARD...60 mph wind gusts. SOURCE...Radar indicated. IMPACT...Expect damage to roofs, siding, and trees. Locations impacted include... Lawton, Walters, Geronimo, Chattanooga, and Faxon. HAIL THREAT...RADAR INDICATED MAX HAIL SIZE...<.75 IN WIND THREAT...RADAR INDICATED MAX WIND GUST...60 MPH
info.instruction: For your protection move to an interior room on the lowest floor of a building. Wind damage with this storm will occur before any rain or lightning. Do not wait for the sound of thunder before taking cover. SEEK SHELTER IMMEDIATELY inside a sturdy structure and stay away from windows.
